string-array.name: updates
string-array.item: v2.3: Fix counting incoming calls, change separator, show contacts name in excluded numbers, allow *555* wildcards, allow to exclude numbers for sms, allow to set separate billing period for data plan, allow to reset traffic stats, add cost to traffic stats, show progressbar for billing cycle, fix some more bugs
v2.2.3: Fix currency FC, add czech translation
v2.2.1: Add theme support, add Hungarian translation
v2.2: Allow to bill incoming calls/messages across two plans, minor changes to gui
v2.1: Allow to set cost for calls/messages, allow to bill incoming traffic only, set excluded numbers from contacts
v2.0: Run callmeter every 30min in background to save logs, add 60/30 billing mode, allow to bill inbound calls/messages, change donator check
v1.1.4: Fix billing date for data plans
v1.1.3: Add 30/1 billing mode, add 1-day-billing data-plans, add hi-res icons
v1.1.2: Fix some bugs, add 30/30 billing mode, add EVE device for traffic counter, allow to bill (excluded) numbers in plan #1 or #2
v1.1.1: Fix happy-new-year-bug (run call meter twice to fix stats)
v1.1: Add data statistics, allow wildcards for excluded numbers: e.g. *555/666* excludes 4555/6667
v1.0.1: Add translations: dutch+potuguese, add 30/6 billing mode
v1.0: Allow a second plan for calls/sms (please check prefs!), allow to bill messages as calls, new about, remove ads for translator, add 30/10 billing mode, remove outdated translations: dutch+czech
